Package gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule

Class RuleContext

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
java.util.HashMap
org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ContextBase
gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule.RuleContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map, org.apache.commons.chain.Context
public class RuleContext extends org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ContextBase
Implements a type-safe context for using validation rules in commands and chains.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

      Returns:
